  • July 14, 2019
    Brihi Joshi has received the best poster award for the work done on Collusive Retweeter Detection with Tanmoy Chakraborty, Hridoy Sankar Dutta and Aditya Chetan at the AI Assisted Data Analytics (AIAD) workshop held at IIIT Delhi.
  • July 01, 2019
    Sarthika Dhawan received ACM-W fellowship, Microsoft IJCAI and INAE travel grant to present her paper in IJCAI’19.
  • June 30, 2019
    Brihi Joshi won the Judge’s Choice Best Poster Award for the work done on Collusive Retweeter Detection with Tanmoy Chakraborty, Hridoy Sankar Dutta and Aditya Chetan at the Research AI Day held at IIM Bangalore and co-organised by IBM India Research Lab. This work on Collusion detection on Twitter fit extremely well with the theme of Research AI Day - “Usable AI”.

    • Siva Charan Reddy is joining Dr. Deepak Padmanabhan's lab at Queen's University, Belfast.

    Best student paper award in JCDL: Go Wide, Go Deep: Quantifying the Impact of Scientific Papers through Influence Dispersion Trees has received “Best Student paper” award in the Joint Conference on Digital Libraries (JCDL) 2019.
